page.title: 05Customs and Events.
page.content: On the Green at Godstone is a pond which has been there for about 150 years. There is also an old path where rope was twisted. The Green used to be a market where produce was sold. A fair is held on the Green, a Soap-box Derby and a Donkey Derby also. Next to the pavillion is a field roller which is about 60 years old.There is a tennis club; they also play Cricket, Bowling and Football. Near the Green is a dairy where we can buy eggs, cheese, butter and milk and on a nearby bench, it says, "Silver Jubilee Tribute to the Queen Elizabeth 2nd, June 7th, 1977." There is also a play area for children.
